[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [VariableMap](./blockly.variablemap_class.md) &gt; [createVariable](./blockly.variablemap_class.createvariable_1_method.md)

## VariableMap.createVariable() method

Create a variable with a given name, optional type, and optional ID.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createVariable(name: string, opt_type?: string | null, opt_id?: string | null): VariableModel;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The name of the variable. This must be unique across variables and procedures. |
|  opt\_type | string \| null | <i>(Optional)</i> The type of the variable like 'int' or 'string'. Does not need to be unique. Field\_variable can filter variables based on their type. This will default to '' which is a specific type. |
|  opt\_id | string \| null | <i>(Optional)</i> The unique ID of the variable. This will default to a UUID. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[VariableModel](./blockly.variablemodel_class.md)

The newly created variable.
